description:
Samoan Passage Towyo Data Archive. Please note that the copy here on zenodo contains only the GitHub repository, data are stored elsewhere.

Head to https://github.com/gunnarvoet/sp-data-archive-towyo for instructions on how to clone the full dataset or download data files manually at https://osf.io/uaem3/.
title: Samoan Passage Towyo Data Archive
notes: If you use this dataset, consider citing it using the metadata from CITATION.cff.
